components.name: transform
components.title: Translate, Scale & Rotate
components.description: This component handles the transformations. It handles the basic attributes like data-x, data-rotate or data-scale-y.

components.name: active
components.title: Active Class
components.description: This component handles the toggling of activeClass and nestedActiveClass.

components.name: circular
components.title: Circular Stepping
components.description: This component handles the natural flow of the steps, taken from the dom order. It is based on the Near component. It also handles the data-exclude attribute.

components.name: start
components.title: Starting Step
components.description: This component handles the config option start.

components.name: ways
components.title: Ways: Routing
components.description: This component handles the data-next and data-prev attributes and the route command.

components.name: ajax
components.title: Ajax Load Steps
components.description: This component enables you to load step via ajax. It handles the data-src and href attribute and offers the "afterStepLoaded" event.

components.name: hash
components.title: Hash in URL
components.description: This component handles updates to and change events from the url hash. It also handles clicks on link to other steps.

components.name: keyboard
components.title: Keyboard
components.description: This component handles navigation with the keyboard. It also offers a binding mechanism for other components, plugins and the user.

components.name: viewport
components.title: Viewport
components.description: This component handles camera zooming to window size and zooming in zoomable steps.

components.name: mouse
components.title: Mouse
components.description: This component handles click on other steps.

components.name: mobile
components.title: Mobile
components.description: This component handles swiping on mobile devices.

components.name: templates
components.title: Templates
components.description: This component handles templates. It handles the data-template attribute and registers the template.

components.name: jqevents
components.title: jQuery events
components.description: This component fires the jQuery events enterStep and leaveStep.

components.name: animation
components.title: Animation
components.description: Apply custom animations to steps. Handles the attribute data-jmpress (the attribute name depends on a config option).

components.name: toggle
components.title: Toggle
components.description: Bind a key to toggle the de/initialization of jmpress.js.

components.name: secondary
components.title: Secondary
components.description: For automatically changing steps after a given duration. Makes the attributes data-duration and data-duration-action available.

components.name: duration
components.title: Duration
components.description: Switches the step automatically after a while.
